fields.name: moduleName
fields.description: Name of the module of the function to be mocked

fields.name: functionName
fields.description: Name of the function to be mocked

records.name: MockConfig
records.description: Configuration of the function to be mocked.

fields.name: groups
fields.description: List of groups that this test function belongs to

fields.name: dataProvider
fields.description: Name of the function which will be used to feed data into this test

fields.name: before
fields.description: Name of the function to be run before the test is run

fields.name: after
fields.description: Name of the function to be run after the test is run

fields.name: dependsOn
fields.description: A list of function names the test function depends on, and will be run before the test

methods.name: init
methods.description: Gets invoked during the stub registration

methods.name: thenReturn
methods.description: Sets the value to be returned when the function is called.

returnParameters.description: object that allows stubbing calls to a function

methods.name: withArguments
methods.description: Sets the arguments list to consider when stubbing the function call.

methods.name: doNothing
methods.description: Sets the function behavior to do nothing when called

parameters.name: functionName
parameters.description: mock function to call in place of the real

methods.name: call
methods.description: Sets a function to be invoked when the real function is called.

methods.name: callOriginal
methods.description: Sets the original function to be invoked.

classes.name: MockObject
classes.description: Represents a Mock object in which to create stubs for member functions and variables

functions.name: assertEquals
functions.description: Asserts whether the given values are equal. If it is not, an AssertError is thrown with the given errorMessage.

functions.name: assertExactEquals
functions.description: Asserts whether the given values are exactly equal. If it is not, an AssertError is thrown with the given errorMessage.

functions.name: assertFail
functions.description: Assert failure is triggered based on user discretion. AssertError is thrown with the given errorMessage.

functions.name: assertFalse
functions.description: Asserts whether the given condition is false. If it is not, a AssertError is thrown with the given errorMessage.

functions.name: assertNotEquals
functions.description: Asserts whether the given values are not equal. If it is equal, an AssertError is thrown with the given errorMessage.

functions.name: assertNotExactEquals
functions.description: Asserts whether the given values are not exactly equal. If it is equal, an AssertError is thrown with the given errorMessage.

functions.name: assertTrue
functions.description: Asserts whether the given condition is true. If it is not, a AssertError is thrown with the given errorMessage.

parameters.name: errorMessage
parameters.description: Custom message for the ballerina error

returnParameters.description: an AssertError with custom message and category

functions.name: createBallerinaError
functions.description: Creates an AssertError with custom message and category.

parameters.name: T
parameters.description: type of object to create the mock

parameters.name: mockObject
parameters.description: mock object to replace the original (optional)

returnParameters.description: created mock object or throw an error if validation failed

functions.name: mock
functions.description: Creates and returns a mock object of provided type description.

returnParameters.description: function return value or error if case registration failed

functions.name: mockHandler
functions.description: Inter-op to handle function mocking.

returnParameters.description: prepared object that allows a member function/field to register stubs

functions.name: prepare
functions.description: Prepares a provided default mock object for stubbing.

returnParameters.description: object that allows stubbing calls to provided function

functions.name: when
functions.description:
Objects and functions related to function mocking
Allows a function to stub.

constants.name: ANY
constants.description: Represents the placeholder to be given for object or record type arguments

constants.name: FUNCTION_CALL_ERROR
constants.description: Represents the reason for function mocking related errors.

constants.name: FUNCTION_NOT_FOUND_ERROR
constants.description: Represents the reason for the non-existing member function related errors.

constants.name: FUNCTION_SIGNATURE_MISMATCH_ERROR
constants.description: Represents the reason for the function signature related errors.

constants.name: INVALID_MEMBER_FIELD_ERROR
constants.description: Represents the reason for the object member field related errors.

constants.name: INVALID_OBJECT_ERROR
constants.description: Represents the reason for the mock object related errors.

modules.summary: This module facilitates developers to write automation tests for ballerina code in a simple manner. It provides a number of capabilities such as configuring setup and cleanup steps in different levels, ordering and grouping of tests, providing value-sets to tests and independence from external functions and endpoints via mocking capabilities.

modules.description: This module facilitates developers to write automation tests for ballerina code in a simple manner.
